name: EasyDomoticChairControl
0:
”Alexa, open chairname”
”Alexa, close chairname”
”Alexa, set chairname to 1”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
With this smart skill you can easily command your domotic chair. Just ask Alexa to open or close your recliner using the name you have setted in domoticsfurniture.com.
Easy Domotic Chair Control interact with all the smart recliner suited for domoticsfurniture.com.
Add the Skill "Easy Domotic Chair Control" via the Alexa app and you will be immediately redirected or with Link Account Card to the site domoticsfurniture.com.
Register into the portal by creating a new account or using your Amazon account. Then add your devices using the smartphone application or with the code provided with the chair. Now give it a name to identify the chair and fully enjoy the potential of the Skill.
